description: The file defines a Flutter widget for browsing and booking pickleball courts, including UI components for displaying courts, error handling, and booking dialogs.

classes.name: CourtBrowserPage
classes.description: A stateful widget that displays a grid of courts with refresh and error handling.

classes.name: _CourtCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing individual court details card.

classes.name: _SlotChip
classes.description: A widget representing an individual booking slot with booking interaction.

methods.name: _onBook
methods.description: Handles the process of booking a court slot, including displaying a booking form and confirming the booking.
